Can be used to store values into the shader, this is called when the filter is applied and the shader has been already started.

Streamer - Class in flounder.sounds
A streamer object is used to carry out the streaming of one playing of a large audio file.

StreamManager - Class in flounder.sounds
This thread runs in the background and keeps any audio streams updated.
